name: Lynch Hot Apple Drink
description: Slightly spicy, this hot apple drink mix is caffeine free and vitamin C enriched.Just add 1 pouch to 170ml of hot water, stir, and enjoy.Contains 10, 23g packets.Ingredients: Apple juice, sugar, dextrose, maltodextrin, natural flavours, citric acid, silicon dioxide, ascorbic acid (vitamin C), caramel, tricalcium phosphate, salt.
